# 1. Download and Install Reference Management Software of your preference

- Zotero: [[https://www.zotero.org/download/]{.ul}](https://www.zotero.org/download/){.uri}

- Mendeley: [[https://www.mendeley.com/download-reference-manager/windows]{.ul}](https://www.mendeley.com/download-reference-manager/windows){.uri}

- EndNote: [[https://endnote.com/downloads]{.ul}](https://endnote.com/downloads){.uri}

# 2. Create an account with Reference Manager of your preference

Register with your university email

- Zotero: [[https://www.zotero.org/user/register]{.ul}](https://www.zotero.org/user/register){.uri}

- Mendeley: [[https://id.elsevier.com]{.ul}](https://id.elsevier.com){.uri} Enter email -> Continue

- EndNote: [[https://access.clarivate.com/register?app=endnote]{.ul}](https://access.clarivate.com/register?app=endnote){.uri}

# 3. Install the web browser plugins for your preferred Reference Manager

```{r UniUrb, echo=FALSE, fig.align='center', message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, out.width="100%"}
knitr::include_graphics(here("Images", "uniurb.png"))

```

Image: Example of plugin for Mendeley and Zotero in Firefox, it is also compatible with chrome and edge. 



# 4. Install the browser plugin

Open your browser and go to setting -> extensions

-   Zotero Connectors: [[https://www.zotero.org/download/connectors]{.ul}](https://www.zotero.org/download/connectors){.uri}

-   Mendeley Web Importer: [[https://www.mendeley.com/reference-management/web-importer]{.ul}](https://www.mendeley.com/reference-management/web-importer){.uri}

-   EndNote Capture Reference Tool: [[https://support.clarivate.com/Endnote/s/article/EndNote-Capture-Reference-Tool?language=en_US]{.ul}](https://support.clarivate.com/Endnote/s/article/EndNote-Capture-Reference-Tool?language=en_US){.uri}
